Text: Re Contract you can flow I confirmed that this was a part ot the rate case settlement on AM To Ora L NGNOTES cc Subject Re Contract In the old days you could only flow of the MDQ from secondary points That was when these contracts were good for the whole year So you are telling me the rules have changed I can now flow from secondary points on AM To cc Subject Re Contract You can use the full contract MDQ to move from and to secondary points Of course this would be subject to any secondary restrictions on PM To Ora L NGNOTES cc Subject Contract We have a FTGSS contract with a MDQ of dts The primary receipt point on this contract is storage BUT we can flow some of this gas from secondary points like Oakford or the Pools How much gas can be sourced from Secondary receipt points
